h1_title: Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You
content: Note that the Smash Stance heavy attack is the best for single target damage, and that you can run while charging it, but it has by far the worst range.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Things_Black_Myth_Wukong_Doesn't_Tell_You.md', within the main section titled 'Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection '11\. Heavy Attacks Work Differently'.
The content is as follows:
Note that the Smash Stance heavy attack is the best for single target damage, and that you can run while charging it, but it has by far the worst range.
